snippet: House Democrats have called for oversight hearings based on reporting in The New York Times that found the rate of sexual assault of Native American women is more than twice the national average.
abstract: House Democrats on the Natural Resources Committee call on the committee’s Republican leadership to hold oversight hearings on the disproportionate rate of sexual assault on Native American women; New York Times investigation found the rate to be more than twice the national average.
lead_paragraph: House Democrats have called for oversight hearings based on reporting in The New York Times that found the rate of sexual assault of Native American women is more than twice the national average.

headline.main: Congressional Hearings Sought on Abuse of Native Women
headline.print_headline: Congressional Hearings Sought On Abuse of Native Women
